channel.title: Eco reset failing :F

item.title: Eco reset failing :F
item.dc:creator: @avirunes avirunes
item.description:
@avirunes wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:2, topic:381535”]resetItems.java

[code=java]import java.io.File;
import java.io.FileInputStream;
import java.io.FileOutputStream;
import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.FileWriter;

public class resetItems
{

    /*Tells the server where the characters folder is located*/
    private static File charDir = new File("./characters/");

    /* Only edit these following 2 methods if you are experienced enough! */
    public static void main(String[] args)
    {
            if(charDir.exists() && charDir.isDirectory())
            {
                    File[] charFiles = charDir.listFiles();
                    for(int i = 0; i < charFiles.length; i++)
                    {
                            resetEcoChar(charFiles[i]);
                            System.out.println("Reset player economy levels for... "+charFiles[i].toString());
                    }
            }
    }

    private static void resetEcoChar(File charFile)
    {
            try
            {
                    String cheatStatus, tempData, tempAdd = ""; int curEquip = 0, curItem = 0, curBank = 0;
                    File tempCharFile = new File(charDir.toString()+"ECOBOOST$TEMP");
                    DataInputStream fileStream = new DataInputStream(new FileInputStream(charFile));
                    BufferedWriter tempOut = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(tempCharFile));
                    while((tempData = fileStream.readLine()) != null)
                    {
                            if((!tempData.trim().startsWith("character-item =")) && (!tempData.trim().startsWith("character-bank =")))
                            {
                                    tempAdd = tempData.trim();
                                    if(tempData.trim().startsWith("character-equip =")) 
                                    {
                                            tempAdd = "character-equip = "+curEquip+"\t-1\t0";
                                            curEquip++;
                                    }
                                    tempOut.write(tempAdd); tempOut.newLine();
                            }
                    }
                    fileStream.close(); tempOut.close();
                    charFile.delete();
                    tempCharFile.renameTo(charFile);
            }
            catch(Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); }
    }

}[/code]

Batch:

@echo off java resetItems pause

Look in snippets section.[/quote]

Thank you!!

Read full topic

[code=java]import java.io.File;
import java.io.FileInputStream;

public class resetItems
{

    /*Tells the server where the characters folder is located*/
    private static File charDir = new File("./characters/");

    /* Only edit these following 2 methods if you are experienced enough! */
    public static void main(String[] args)
    {
            if(charDir.exists() && charDir.isDirectory())

                    for(int i = 0; i < charFiles.length; i++)

                            System.out.println("Reset player economy levels for... "+charFiles[i].toString());

    }

    private static void resetEcoChar(File charFile)
    {
            try
            {
                    String cheatStatus, tempData, tempAdd = ""; int curEquip = 0, curItem = 0, curBank = 0;
                    File tempCharFile = new File(charDir.toString()+"ECOBOOST$TEMP");
                    DataInputStream fileStream = new DataInputStream(new FileInputStream(charFile));
                    BufferedWriter tempOut = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(tempCharFile));
                    while((tempData = fileStream.readLine()) != null)

                            {

                                    if(tempData.trim().startsWith("character-equip =")) 
                                    {
                                            tempAdd = "character-equip = "+curEquip+"\t-1\t0";
                                            curEquip++;
                                    }
                                    tempOut.write(tempAdd); tempOut.newLine();
                            }
                    }
                    fileStream.close(); tempOut.close();
                    charFile.delete();
                    tempCharFile.renameTo(charFile);

            catch(Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); }

}[/code]

item.title: Eco reset failing :F
item.dc:creator: @avirunes avirunes
item.description:
@avirunes wrote:

Yea my eco reset is failing :S, just want all items from all players deleted.

this is my EconomyReset.java

[code]import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.FileInputStream;
import java.io.FileWriter;

public class EconomyReset {

    private static File charDir = new File("./characters/");

    public static void main(String[] args) {
            if (charDir.exists() && charDir.isDirectory()) {
                    File[] charFiles = charDir.listFiles();
                    for (int i = 0; i < charFiles.length; i++) {
                            resetEcoChar(charFiles[i]);
                            System.out.println("Reset player economy levels for... "
                                            + charFiles[i].toString());
                    }
            }
    }

    private static void resetEcoChar(File charFile) {
            try {

                    String cheatStatus, tempData, tempAdd = "";
                    int curEquip = 0, curItem = 0, curBank = 0;
                    File tempCharFile = new File(charDir.toString() + "ECOBOOST$TEMP");
                    DataInputStream fileStream = new DataInputStream(
                                    new FileInputStream(charFile));
                    BufferedWriter tempOut = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(
                                    tempCharFile));

                    while ((tempData = fileStream.readLine()) != null) {
                            if ((!tempData.trim().startsWith("character-item ="))
                                            && (!tempData.trim().startsWith("character-bank ="))) {
                                    tempAdd = tempData.trim();

                                    if (tempData.trim().startsWith("character-equip =")) {
                                            tempAdd = "character-equip = " + curEquip + "\t-1\t0";
                                            curEquip++;
                                    }
                                    tempOut.write(tempAdd);
                                    tempOut.newLine();
                            }
                    }
                    fileStream.close();
                    tempOut.close();
                    charFile.delete();
                    tempCharFile.renameTo(charFile);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
            }
    }

}[/code]

and

my.bat

@echo off Java EconomyReset pause

i get the error could not find the main class: EconomyReset.

Read full topic
